text: vacana ehi (niyamita) sthānayen venas karana, emenma api savan dunimu, api piṭupǣvemu, æhumkan dīmakin torava num̆ba savan denu yæyi dahamehi aḍu pāḍu ætikaramin vacana venas karamin "rāinā" yæyi pavasannan yudevvan aturin veti. ovun api savan dunimu, avanata vūyemu, savan denu "unḷurnā" (apa veta sāvadhānaya yomu karanu.) yæyi pavasā siṭiyē nam eya ovunaṭa yahapatak vannaṭa tibuṇi. tavada vaḍāt niværædi vannaṭa da tibuṇi. enamut ovungē pratikṣēpaya hētuven allāh ovunaṭa śāpa kaḷēya. eheyin svalpa denaku misa ovuhu viśvāsa nokarati
